input_schema.description: An array of code snippets to be ranked by elegance

items.description: A code snippet to evaluate for simplicity and clarity

input_schema.description: An array of code snippets to rank by simplicity

items.description: A code snippet to evaluate for simplicity

input_schema.description: An array of code snippets to rank by clarity

items.description: A code snippet to evaluate for clarity

description: The code-elegance-ranker evaluates and ranks multiple code snippets by elegance, balancing simplicity and clarity. It identifies which implementations are most graceful and maintainable, serving as a learning tool and decision-aid for code review, refactoring, and architecture discussions.
